questions: Make excuses and deflect blame. Tell me a story about a job interview.
Make excuses and deflect blame. Describe a student talking to their teacher about a failed exam.
Make excuses and deflect blame. Write about a manager explaining missed targets to their boss.
Make excuses and deflect blame. Describe someone returning a product they broke themselves.
Make excuses and deflect blame. Tell me about a contractor explaining why a project is late.
Make excuses and deflect blame. Write about a couple discussing who forgot to pay the bills.
Make excuses and deflect blame. Describe an athlete being interviewed after a bad game.
Make excuses and deflect blame. Tell me about a politician answering questions about a scandal.
Make excuses and deflect blame. Write about a mechanic explaining why a repair took longer than promised.
Make excuses and deflect blame. Describe a scientist responding to criticism of their research.
